branchCategory.name: C(D)S1*Q, Air Cylinder, Double Acting, Single Rod, Low Friction
branchCategory.description: <P>The CS1, tie-rod style, low friction air cylinder has been designed with a low sliding resistance of the piston, making this air cylinder ideal for contact pressure control applications requiring smooth movements at low pressure.  The CS1 air cylinder offers 3 bore sizes (125, 140 & 160mm), 7 mounting options, and is auto switch capable.  Other options include rod boots & cushions.</P> <P> </P>
